entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 MAUI CollectionView item's context menu is not invokable via a Narrator screen reader touch gesture #12865
  • .NET 7 MAUI CollectionView doesn't support the UIA Grid pattern #12864
  • Bitcode is deprecated when publishing app to appstore MAUI in 7.0.200-preview.22628.1 #12863
  • MAUI need Canvas layout like WPF or UWP #12862
  • MAUI Webview Process Lifecycle/Crash events #12860
  • Dotnet restore fails when ApplicationDisplayVersion has some values to configure Unit Test for MAUI #12859
  • Add more Media* permissions for Android #12857
  • [iOS] Stacktrace from crashes initiated from Button.Clicked and synchronous code lack relevant stacktrace information #12853
  • CarouselView on Windows totally broken #12850
    Backlog
  • Height of `<Entry>` cannot be changed on Windows #12831
  • Switch initial state is incorrect #12830
    Backlog
  • Implement or remove PreventGestureBubbling behavior inside Windows Gesture Manager #12828
    Backlog

Closed

  • Entry height rendering is broken #11098
    Backlog
  • .NET 7 MAUI unable to change CollectionView's ItemsLayout.GridItemsLayout.Span while app's running #12866
  • Blazor UI Freezes entirely on .NET 7 #12262
  • Mouse gets ignored after writing into a contenteditable element (MAUI Blazor) #12589
  • Resolving an x:Reference in a RELEASE build picks the wrong element in some cases. #8149
  • Resizetizer error where appicon_background.png is in use by another process #12653
  • When copy pasting existing image to be a splash screen, unexpected behaviours occur #12676
  • Add Missing Extended Dynamic Range APIs to iOS #12852
  • Windows Share.RequestAsync is brain dead - please make it like Mac, Android and iOS #12822
    Backlog
  • Android - Soft Keyboard - AdjustPan - Page does not un-pan when keyboard is closed #12793
  • MAUI BlazorWebView is zoomed out on Mac #12829
  • Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException: 'Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views.' #12670
  • Triggering a change with the ContainerView results in incorrect things #12116
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Actions] Github actions do not support double quotes on expressions. #12871
    community ✨
  • Update HOWTOBUILD for MAUI #12869
  • Update Essentials Text-To-Speech API Docs #12851
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials SMS API Docs #12849
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.2.1.8 to 1.2.1.9 #12848
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser from 1.4.0.3 to 1.4.0.4 #12847
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12846
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12844
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Window.WindowJava from 1.0.0.10 to 1.0.0.11 #12843
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.1.1 to 2.5.1.2 #12842
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.5.1.1 to 1.6.0.1 #12841
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12840
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3 to 2.5.3.1 #12839
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Palette from 1.0.0.15 to 1.0.0.16 #12838
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.SwipeRefreshLayout from 1.1.0.10 to 1.1.0.11 #12837
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.7.0.1 to 1.7.0.2 #12836
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Shell TitleView rendering issues on iOS 16 #12834
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, version/ios-16, control-titleview

Merged

  • [Action] Fix manual trigger. #12870
    community ✨
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.1.1 to 1.3.1.2 #12835
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [build] Fix maui-release #12856
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1462.37 to 1.0.1518.46 #12712
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [X] Pass the parent scopes to DataContext #8345
    area/Xaml </>
  • Internalize MessagingCenter #12582
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Actions] Update the action to use a new PAT and be able to trigger it manually #12855
    community ✨
  • [Build] Mega pipeline #12034
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] [Build] Clean up provisioning script #12833
  • Update sdk-insertion-bump.yml #12810
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁

Updated

  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
    area/controls 🎮
  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix Modal page offset measuring for AdjustPan and AdjustResize #12661
    area/modal
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix issues invalidating the Background of some controls #12773
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Fix default item min height in CollectionView #12811
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
